question: With Customs library, can I create my own library which will be visible then always for me or just for that specific style?

This means that whenever you are typing the first letters of that feature again, the system will remember and you will see it in the dropdown menu where you can directly select it before typing everything again.

question: Is a B-source also allowed to initialize a Change Request if they find a mistake in the BOM?

question: Is Design PACK Accurancy.also available for FTW?

The Speed Proposition comes from MP and as per the value received from MP, Production Feasibility is defaulted in Origo

question: Will aTP test result page be linked directly to Origo on the product testing section? Would be great to have link in CP under Testing details which brings you to the ATP test side.

question: For product lifecycle promotions. For FTW, one of the pre-conditions to set an article to sample ready is BOM validation. Does this mean that a BOM validation simply needs to be executed? question: it is not mentioned in the manual, but when I pick up and drag a column into the pinned panel, a pin icon shows up just like it does in the overview screen. However, when I let go it does not get pinned. Is this a planned feature or this pin icon is a glitch?

question: Will the BOM auto lock during Buy Ready if there are issues within the BOM?

question: Does the Development factory need to have “priority A” for the factory allocation? If the Development factory does NOT do any production, how should we proceed with the factory priority within Creation Portal?

question: Changes after BR -> is it possible to enter a reason, when rejecting a Change Request?

question: BOM Variations: is it possible to do Variations with Complex Materials?

question: To promote an article to "Sample Ready" status, do we need to have a completely clean BOM within the system? Or do we only need to do a validation? question: On BOM with variation, when filter only article with variation, BOM still show both the white row (default group) and blue row (group with variation). Is it possible to only show the BOM rows corresponding to the filtered article number?

question: When the T2 selection menu was popping up by entering a material in BOM, the question came up if it’s still in scope to have the T2 selection sorted by region. question: In CP, when article is buy ready, it will remain buy- ready for C/O seasons. question: Per my understanding, T1s are not supposed to have Edit Right for Speed attributes. It is found in Training session Biz environment that T1 can edit these speed attributes. Is there any change to the process ? or is this just wrong access right?

question: Hi, would like to check if LO doesn't have any access of Article grouping history... as we cannot view any data after we group the article.

question: Material level numbers will be seen as layer numbers on DBOM, is that correct?
answer: Yes, this is correct - in future we will have only 2 different layers. Layer 1 only once and the possibility to add several Layer 2 to describe colors or executions for Material, Trims or Artworks.

question: If the price for the material is not available in the system in current season, then which price of material BOM will capture for that carryied forward season. Please advise
answer: When model gets carried over to a new season, the material is carried over as well irrespective of whether it is available in toolbox or not. The prices however, depending on whether, it is available for the new effectivity dates, will be automatically shown from MLM. If there are override values entered (ex: Price OVR, CIF % OVR, Loss % OVR), they are carried over automatically. They will be removed only when someone updates the material for that part in the CO season.

question: Factory BOM manual Page#4, says CCDA to update yield on A-fty while T1 use to update yield in BOMs therefore could you please check and be more specifically mention in manual for those cases where CCDA use to update yield, thank you!
answer: CC-Dev has the right to edit the BOM, but will update the BOM yield at P1/P2 comment phase for A-FTY only to calculate P1/P2BE CS

question: Need help to have clarity/explanation on this point, "Does the BOM for non-carryover articles conform to the current and future lifecycles? Full check is not run if all articles are carryovers or dropped."
answer: "Does the BOM for non-carryover articles conform to the current and future lifecycles?" means that only articles that are not carryovers are checked in the validation. The validation is done for rules for the current lifecycle and also looking to the future, for rules of the upcoming lifecycle states. "Full check is not run if all articles are carryovers or dropped" means that if every article in the model is either a carryover or is dropped, then the full check will not be run.

question: My understanding is that Fiber Text Position (Japan) & Remarks (Japan) can be updated even after BR. Could you please confirm that my understanding is correct?
answer: Yes, and Label section attributes even dont require a BOM CR

question: Material search function is not yet it in CP but when transferred across, will it contain all functions like we currently have in PDM?

question: Is there a mass change possible in origo/CP as done in Flex with “Fill column” (as shown below). Or is a mass change only possible with drag and apply function in the product list?
answer: Since Mass updates of BOMs is across Models this will be a PAPP function, which is right now not in scope

question: In the BOM in CP “Process” and “Tooling and testing” part is part of the BOM. Will these 2 BOM part sections stay in Flex? Or is there any workaround for this till it is transferred to BOM?
answer:
Process is still part of the BOM in Creation Portal. Tooling & Testing will be handled in Creation Portal a different way, but it does not need to be entered in Flex.
Tooling is already now (with Go Live 1) handled on the cost sheet. This is mentioned in the Go Live I Costing training manuals in the Cost Sheet Edit manual on page 49.

question: Time shown on Testing server do not reflect Herzo time zone but is 2 hours late. Will this be correct on Production server
answer: The server time is independent from the location of the user. It refelects th Production server time and is the same in all locations. Testing Server and Production server will use the same time zone

question: Regarding the localized material, as showed on BOM a red star, before we had discussion in China, which team is responsible for evaluating which material can be local sourced, would like to check in creation portal what's the logic? same as PDM? which team is responsible for it?
answer: We have not changed anything in terms of who decides whether a material is Local Sourcing Allowed or how it is entered in MLM. Creation Portal just receives the data from MLM.

question: Can we look back at versions of the BOM without snapshot?
answer: No, you will need to create a snapshot and then view the snapshot to see historic information. There is no other versioning of the BOM.

question: Will origo enables the automatic calculation for primegreen primeblue directly?
answer: We have begun discussing requirements for Sustainability, but we don't have enough details yet. After we have gone live with Go Live 2, we'll continue with this topic and we'll be sure to inform everyone of the future capabilities.

question:
the thickness should be defined already after material selection, how come the thickness can be override and the material shows still released with any thickness? current DTR is test based on different thickness.
_x000D_
For example: hulex mono plus reflective - it might be released with 0.5mm thickness, but rejected with 0.3mm thickness?dy after material selection, how come the thickness can be override and the material shows still released with
any thickness? current DTR is test based on different thickness.
answer: In some cases, we need to be able to select an Addition that overrides the initial information (like width) coming from MLM. It was only possible for us to open it up for all Additions or none for now. In cases where the DTR is based on a certain value, like with thickness, please do NOT select a new thickness in the BOM, but keep the one that comes with the material from MLM.

question: CIF auto filled function in BOM not working in CP Biz server.
answer: This is really dependent on which T1-T2 combinations you are having in the BOM. Also today in Flex, not every combination is in the look-up table and will therefore automatically be filled. That is why we are having the OVR field in the new Digital BOM to enter the CIF if it´s not appearing automatically.

question: mold code (heel counter) and print code (woven label) as addition: are they must have to be selected? usually heel counter and woven label are created specifically with different MLM ID already to differentiate.
answer: See BOM Writing Guideline #18 for details. They are not mandatory from a system perspective. Mold codes can still be selected as an Addition, but in Creation Portal, it just looks like a pulldown. You can find the Material Mold Code column in the Edit Leading BOM view. The same is for the Print Code.
